page.title: 19EDUCATION IN THE AREA
page.content: Fairfield High School is the main Comprehensive school in the area. Although it is situated outside the study area it does serve the community of the area in many ways. The school offers a high standard of academic studies for its pupils, and provides facilities for the many feeder primary schools. The building houses well equiped science rooms, an impressive craft and design block, an impressive computer department and affords the pupils the latest teachings of Humanities Languages, English and Maths.
